title: Dead Set
description: Hunting zombies is a tough job and Gemma Sinclair's been working harder than ever to clear the streets of Detroit, Dead City.She can deal with the feral Biters, her mother, and even the reappearance of sexy secret agent Thomas Conroy. But an undead serial killer who rips his victims apart will take her to the limit.Now the entire city's on edge and if the zombies don't get her the rioters might.
author: Aleah Barley
